headline: Ford recalls 1.45 million vehicles in US over faulty rear-view cameras
summary: The auto agency report says that the issue affects an estimated 2.7% of the recalled vehicles.

headline: Autonomous Vehicles Market Forecast and Competitive Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Ford, Volvo, AUDI Aktiengesellschaft, General Motors, Tesla, Toyota, Uber Technologies, BMW
summary: The Autonomous Vehicles (AV) market is poised for exponential growth, expected to surge from US$ 87.23 billion in 2024 to US$ 991.70 billion by 2033, achieving a CAGR of 31.01% from 2025 onwards. Key drivers include advances in AI and ML, expanding personal vehicle purchases, and governments supporting AV innovations. Notable market segments include transportation, logistics, and military applications. Prominent players are Ford, Tesla, and Uber, with North America leading in market share. Despi

headline: Ford launches first new global brand overhaul since 2012. What it is
summary: The campaign, called 'Ready, Set, Ford,' will start in the U.S. with a spot called 'Anthem' to air on television and other places starting Sept. 10.
